Sentencas: Partial substitution of lower valent dopant ions (e.g. Al, Ga, Mg, Zn) onto the Si site in the oxide ion conductor La9.33Si6O26 has been reported to increase the conductivity.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural changes on Zn doping in the apatite-type oxide ion conductor La9.33Si6O26:: A combined neutron diffraction and atomistic simulation study

Sentencas: In this paper, we report combined atomistic simulation and neutron powder diffraction studies of Zn doping with a view to explaining this enhancement.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural changes on Zn doping in the apatite-type oxide ion conductor La9.33Si6O26:: A combined neutron diffraction and atomistic simulation study

Sentencas: The neutron diffraction studies show that, in agreement with cation size expectations, an enlargement of the unit cell is observed on Zn substitution for Si.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural changes on Zn doping in the apatite-type oxide ion conductor La9.33Si6O26:: A combined neutron diffraction and atomistic simulation study

Sentencas: In addition, the refinement suggests that a significant number of oxide ions are displaced into interstitial positions at the channel periphery.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural changes on Zn doping in the apatite-type oxide ion conductor La9.33Si6O26:: A combined neutron diffraction and atomistic simulation study

Sentencas: Atomistic simulation studies show significant local structural changes affecting the oxide ion channels on Zn doping.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural changes on Zn doping in the apatite-type oxide ion conductor La9.33Si6O26:: A combined neutron diffraction and atomistic simulation study

Sentencas: In particular, a local expansion of the channels is observed, while the tilting of the MO4 tetrahedra is altered by replacing Si with Zn.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural changes on Zn doping in the apatite-type oxide ion conductor La9.33Si6O26:: A combined neutron diffraction and atomistic simulation study

Sentencas: The presence of significant interstitial oxide ions and both the above local structural changes are consistent with the observed increase in conductivity.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural changes on Zn doping in the apatite-type oxide ion conductor La9.33Si6O26:: A combined neutron diffraction and atomistic simulation study
